      • getToolchain

        public String getToolchain(File file)
                    throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Tries to resolve the toolchain based on the path of the file.
        Parameters:
        file - Native library
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - When no toolchain is found

      • getNdkBuildPath

        public String getNdkBuildPath()
        Returns the complete path for the ndk-build tool, based on this NDK.
        Returns:
        the complete path as a String, including the tool's filename.

      • getGdbServer

        public File getGdbServer(String ndkArchitecture)
                  throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

      • getToolchainFromArchitecture

        public String getToolchainFromArchitecture(String ndkArchitecture,
                                  NDKArchitectureToolchainMappings ndkArchitectureToolchainMappings)
                                    throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Retrieves, based on the architecture and possibly toolchain mappings, the toolchain for the architecture.
        Note: This method will return the default toolchain as defined by the NDK if not specified in the NDKArchitectureToolchainMappings.
        Parameters:
        ndkArchitecture - Architecture to resolve toolchain for
        ndkArchitectureToolchainMappings - User mappings of architecture to toolchain
        Returns:
        Toolchain to be used for the architecture
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - If a toolchain can not be resolved
